com.neatnodes.algorithm

Class InnovationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neatnodes.algorithm.InnovationManager

  • public class InnovationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that tracks the innovations that occur each generation and provides innovation numbers to use for new Connections created as part of the NEAT algorithm. The purpose of this class is to ensure that equivalent mutations in the same generation are assigned the same innovation number, as specified by the NEAT algorithm.
    Author:
    Sam Griffin

      • newGeneration

        public void newGeneration()

      • getInnovationNumber

        public int getInnovationNumber(int inNodeLabel,
                               int outNodeLabel)
        Checks to see if a potential new Connection defined by two Nodes is equivalent to an existing innovation from the current generation. If it is, returns its innovation number. If not, returns the next available innovation number and adds it to the list of current innovations. This method should be used to assign innovation numbers for all new Connections created as part of the NEAT algorithm.
        Parameters:
        inNodeLabel - The label of the in-node.
        outNodeLabel - The label of the out-node.
        Returns:
        The innovation number to use for the new Connection.
